Type.Name: EdgePosition

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EdgePosition extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Used to pass around information about the position of a GnomeDruidPage within the overall GnomeDruid.
Docs.remarks: This enables the correct "surrounding" content for the page to be drawn.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gnome.EdgePosition Finish = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The current page is at the end of the druid.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gnome.EdgePosition Last = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Used internally to indicate the last value of the enumeration. This should not be passed in to any function expecting a GnomeEdgePosition value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gnome.EdgePosition Other = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The current page is neither the first nor the last page (usually not required).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gnome.EdgePosition Start = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The current page is at the beginning of the druid.
